definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: Paul left his convertible parked in the rain with the roof open.
sentences.chinese: 保羅把敞篷車停在雨中，車頂沒關就離開了。

sentences.english: There are two types of PLBs: 'green' amd 'red' minibuses, whose roofs are coloured accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 公共小巴分綠色和紅色兩類，從車頂的顏色可以識別。

sentences.english: Visible in these photos are the sweep of the roofline and the stubby rear deck.
sentences.chinese: 看到這些照片是橫掃車頂和短後甲板。

sentences.english: Install the screws attaching the CHMSL to the liftgate.
sentences.chinese: 安裝用以固定燈至車頂的緊固件。

sentences.english: Lift one edge of each skid strip with a putty knife and peel it from roof panel .
sentences.chinese: 用油灰刀擡高防滑帶的一邊並且從車頂飾板上剝落它。

sentences.english: Tape magnets to the bottom of a cup, put it on the roof of your car and drive around.
sentences.chinese: 在杯底粘上一塊磁鐵，放到車頂上，開着車四處兜風。

sentences.english: Clip fastening part of headliner in rear area.
sentences.chinese: 卡入車頂襯裏後面區域的緊固件。

sentences.english: Separate trim panel from roof panel.

sentences.chinese: 安裝尾部區域的車頂襯裏。

sentences.english: Net bag of cat seat, tail compartments and roof!
sentences.chinese: 汽車座椅後背插網袋，尾廂存物網，車頂吊網。

sentences.english: Close sunroof to center glass panel in roof opening.
sentences.chinese: 關閉遮陽蓬頂至車頂開口處的中心玻璃板。

sentences.english: Nick saw the lights of the ambulances through the hole in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 尼克從車頂的洞看見救護車的燈光射進來。

sentences.english: Its curvaceous body is topped by a coupe-like roofline.
sentences.chinese: 其婀娜多姿的身體首位的是一轎跑車般的車頂。

sentences.english: We don't have a roof on our car.
The roof lining, door linings and instrument panel are also covered in Alcantara .
sentences.chinese: 車頂內襯，車門襯裏和儀表板，也包括在阿爾坎塔拉。

sentences.english: Fasten the convertible -top covering with the fastening screws starting from the rear bottom side of the roof frame.
sentences.chinese: 從車頂框後端底側起，用緊固螺釘緊固活頂罩。

definition: car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
